subject: Management
title: Defining Done
description: A quick win: understand Defining Done.

hook.text: Two people left the same meeting with different ideas of what 'done' meant. Both were wrong.

buildup.text: Vague outcomes produce vague results. 'Improve the report' means ten different things.

discovery.text: Define done with a specific, observable result: what will exist when this is complete?

twist.text: You don't need to define howâ€”just what done looks like. Method is their call.

climax.text: A crisp definition of done lets you evaluate output without controlling process.

punchline.text: If you can't describe done, don't delegate yet.

quiz.question: What is the best way to define 'done' for a delegated task?
options: Describe the specific observable result expected
Explain every step of how to do it
Leave it open so the person can be creative
